metadata.title: YXLJC Footstool Protector Non Slip Waterproof Soft Square Ottoman Cover with Elastic Bottom (Color : Beige)
features: Material : Our footstool covers are made from polyester and spandex jacquard material that is soft to the touch, breathable and comfortable to sit on, and durable and hard-wearing to use.
Protection : These footstool covers are super soft and comfortable and will protect your footstool from spills, stains and tears. A great choice for families with children and pets.
Care : The stool covers are machine washable for easy care and maintenance, wash at around 30 degrees Celsi-us. We recommend using a mild washing powder and please do not bleach.
Installation: The elastic bottom around the hem strengthens the footrest cover, making the cover better fixed in place. Good elasticity and shrinkage make its surface smoother without wrinkles.
Use occasions: This Ottoman stool set is suitable for living room, bedroom, kitchen, office, meeting area, hotel, banquet and other occasions.
description: This soft and high-stretch footstool cover gives your living room a new look, while protecting your furniture from pet hair, splashes, etc.It can also turn an old footstool into a stunning centerpiece of your room, keeping your footstool in a brand new condition.A variety of optional colors provide another look for your Ottoman style, making it a unique feature of your house.Specifications:Material: Polyester + spandexColour: As shownSeason: All SeasonsSize: 68-82cm/27-32"Set includes:1 x Ottoman coverWarn:1. Due to many factors such as computer screen brightness or illuminance, the actual color of the product may be slightly different from the website picture.2. The size is measured manually, please allow an error of 1-2cm / 0.39-0.79inch.3. Please note that the accessories in the background picture are not included.
